Job Description: Job Description    Junior Software Developer Web Developer   Fresher with proven experience and strong technical skill can also apply.  Ideal Candidate will have :  1. Minimum Qualification : ME, MTech, BE, BTech, MCA, MSc ( Comp. Science)  2. At least 1+ years of software development experience in any of the following technologies Web Technology stack MERNLAMP, C# .NET, JAVA.  3. Excellent understanding of OOP Concepts.  4. Strong Database skills in any of the following : MS-SQL or MYSQL ( Query, Functions, Stored procedures) or MongoDB  5. Experience with PHP or Node.js, React or Angular.  6. Proven experience with full stack web development is plus.  7. Experience with troubleshooting & debugging.  8. Good understanding of the Software Development Life Cycle process.  9. Excellent communication, documentation and interpersonal skills, problem solving skills.  10. Proactive , highly motivated attitude, detailed oriented and quick learner.  11. General Understanding Cloud Computing AWS is plus.  12. Experience with software testing, JIRA bug tracking is plus.  Exciting work environment in fast growing company. Ample opportunity to thrive in your career working on latest technologies along with passionate team of senior developers in India and USA.  Location Nagpur
